title: Dev Connect | Developers Forum
description: A fully responsive MERN stack developer forum with Firebase authentication, voting system, role-based dashboards, and Stripe-powered membership upgrades.
challenges: Ensuring seamless integration between Firebase authentication and custom JWT-based route protection while maintaining responsive performance on all devices.
improvements: Add a real-time chat feature, improve post search with AI-based suggestions, and enable offline mode for better accessibility.

title: WeVibe - Social Events Platform
description: A community-driven platform for creating, joining, and tracking social service events like cleanups, tree plantations, and donation drives.
keyFeature: Search and filter by event type
challenges: Managing date-based filtering logic to only display upcoming events while keeping query performance fast.
improvements: Introduce a map-based event locator, allow users to invite friends, and add in-app notifications for joined events.

title: Recipe Book App
description: A recipe management app for food lovers to add, update, and share recipes, discover trending dishes, and save favorites.
keyFeature: Top recipes section based on likes
challenges: Optimizing image uploads for recipe images while keeping storage costs low and ensuring fast load times.
improvements: Add video recipe tutorials, AI-based ingredient suggestions, and advanced nutritional breakdown for each recipe.
